product_name: Playboating the Nantahala River - An Entry Level Guide
long_description: Written for the developing whitewater paddler, this guide is jam-packed with solid information on playboating the Nantahala and Tuckaseigee rivers. Fischer, Kelly. Softcover; 96 pages; instructional illustrations and maps. Published by Milestone Press; copyright by Milestone Press, Inc. 1998. You'll learn where to surf the biggest waves, perfect your boofs, ferries and peel-outs. Provides information on where to put in and take out if you want to run just a short section of river. Includes difficulty ratings for each spot, a glossary of playboating terms and information on water release schedules. Illustrated by paddler Keith Calhoun; and informative historical anecdotes add fun.
short_description: Written for the developing whitewater paddler, this guide is jam-packed with solid information on playboating the Nantahala and Tuckaseigee rivers.
